# Multiserver

The goal of Multiserver is to display a table that shows a first come, first serve queuing system.

## Download

Download the development version of my package by running, 

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("archiehanlon/bankmodels")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library("Multiserver")
Multiserver(bank$arrival_time, bank$service_time, 1)
```
